document_data.name: Seared Tuna
document_data.mainbody: '''Seared tuna''' was a lean [[tuna]] dish from the lands around [[Neverwinter]] near the end of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The dish used [[yellow-fin]] tuna species of fish. Its steaks were lightly seared and intentionally left undercooked on the inside. Many chefs did not appreciate requests to cook the tuna thoroughly.
